structure.unit: STATE UNIVERSITIES AND COLLEGES -- REGIONAL EDUCATION -- ARCHAEOLOGY

law.text: The council shall meet at least four (4) times each year at such times as it determines by resolution. Special meetings may be called by the chairman. Upon request of three (3) institutions represented on the council, the chairman shall call a special meeting.
law.history: Amended 1962 Ky. Acts ch. 129, sec. 2. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 4527-7.
